entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 03:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 40 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
